quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: I keep track of Kindle highlights and quotes that I found interesting, entertaining or note-worthy. They are viewable in this YML file.

laptop.title: Laptop rebuild
laptop.description: I rebuild my laptop from scratch regularly. I find it useful to have a way of quickly resetting my machine between clients, in a fully automated way. This setup also serves security and disaster recovery purposes.

euler.title: Project Euler
euler.description: I enjoy solving the maths problems on Project Euler. I have a script monitoring any new problems published there.

training.title: Training
training.description: I store technical training courses, tutorials and articles I am currently working on or plan to be working on in the future in a Trello board.

challenges.title: Challenges
challenges.description: I store coding challenges that I'd like to solve, eg from the Google Code Jam or Codility, in a Trello board.
